properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 11 at 10:54AM CST until January 11 at 11:30AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
Eastern Noxubee County in east central Mississippi...
Eastern Kemper County in east central Mississippi...

* Until 1130 AM CST.

* At 1054 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a
tornado was located over Porterville, or 14 miles north of
Lauderdale, moving northeast at 65 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* This dangerous storm will be near...
Cooksville and Paulette around 1110 AM CST.

Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include
Scooba.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 11:30 AM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
